      Methods in ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local that return types with arguments of type Choice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Choice> ChoiceManager.getChoicesByChapter(java.util.UUID chapterId) 
      java.util.ArrayList<Choice> ChoiceManager.retrieve(Choice criteria)
      Retrieves a choice from the database.

      The choice passed into this method is a story holding search criteria, so any field you would like to include in the search, just set the search criteria holding choice to it.

      * Example Call.
      Choice c = new choice("123ad4", "123de", "d342a", "text");
      ChoiceManager chm = ChoiceManager.getInstance(someActivity.this);
      chm.insert(c);
      To now search for this choice based on its tect:

      Choice criteria = new choice(null, null, null, "text");
      Methods in ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local with parameters of type Choice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ChoiceManager.insert(Choice choice)
      Saves a new choice to the database.

      Example Call.
      Choice c = new choice("123ad4", "123de", "d342a", "text");
      ChoiceManager chm = ChoiceManager.getInstance(someActivity.this);
      chm.insert(c);
      java.util.ArrayList<Choice> ChoiceManager.retrieve(Choice criteria)
      Retrieves a choice from the database.

      The choice passed into this method is a story holding search criteria, so any field you would like to include in the search, just set the search criteria holding choice to it.

      * Example Call.
      Choice c = new choice("123ad4", "123de", "d342a", "text");
      ChoiceManager chm = ChoiceManager.getInstance(someActivity.this);
      chm.insert(c);
      To now search for this choice based on its tect:

      Choice criteria = new choice(null, null, null, "text");
      void ChoiceManager.update(Choice newChoice)
      Updates a choice already in the database.
